other_tests.procedure_name: Gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC-MS) urinary steroid profiling
other_tests.findings: Combined deficiencies of 17,20-lyase and 21-hydroxylase; elevated markers of 17-hydroxylase deficiency; signs of 21-hydroxylase deficiency.
Basal and post-ACTH 17OHP levels were elevated; poor cortisol response to ACTH.
